Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Encode periods in card names to prevent Rails format parsing

Rails interprets unencoded periods in URL paths as format separators,
causing cards like "Dr. Lysithea Starweaver" to fail with 404 errors.
The period was being kept literal, so "/cards/Dr.%20Venn" was parsed
as card name "Dr" with format "%20Venn".

Now periods are encoded as %2E, fixing access to all cards with
periods in their names \(e.g., "Dr.", "Inc.", "v1.0"\).

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
